title: Industrial Goods 2
desc:
Post 68
This card remains in inventory until used and can be traded. Gain 100$. Gain an additional 100$ for each time this individual instance of the card has been traded. Once this individual instance leaves your inventory, you may not regain it. The only way this differs from Industrial Goods (31) is that it is not considered the same as Industrial Goods when referred in any card text, and also has a cap of 500$.
